intro: Monelasmum konakrense, commonly known as the Konakrénse milkweed, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Africa. It belongs to the Apocynaceae family, which includes many plants with milky sap. The plant features showy, clustered flowers that are typically pink or white in color. Its leaves are opposite and often have a velvety texture. Monelasmum konakrense is adapted to thrive in arid or semi-arid environments, making it a resilient species in its native habitat.
